name: Say Goodbye
description: This visual novel about an ordinary man with his typical problems. Suddenly, you got a report that your distant cousin died in a car crash. Fortunately, her daughter wasn't with her. You take the girl under your wing. But soon, something starts to go wrong...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 1 GB available space
